name: @sailscasts/sails-hook-node-fetch
description: Exposes the node-fetch module as built-in helpers in your Sails app.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run custom-tests
scripts.custom-tests: node ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha && echo "Custom tests all passed." && echo
scripts.lint: node ./node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint . --max-warnings=0 && echo 'âœ”  Your code looks good.'
